Egypt, added the statement, recognized and appreciated the care accorded by Germany to the painted limestone bust of the famous ancient Egyptian queen, but added: Egypt is confident that the German authorities will assist in facilitating its return. The government and people of Egypt are eager that this unique treasure be returned to the possession of its rightful owners, the Egyptian people. If returned, Zahi Hawass said, the bust will be exhibited at a new museum south of Cairo. the first time as a Piston, Allen Iverson scored 17 points and led Detroit to a 107-97 victory over the slumping Milwaukee Bucks.`` With everything going on, I wanted to play well,'' Allen Iverson said. Andy Coulson was employed by David Cameron to improve the Conservative Party's media operation in the run-up to the May 2010 election. I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so, David Cameron said in an e-mailed statement.`` Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government.''
